title: GiftList
description: GiftList, the all-in-one gifting platform, is the easiest way to exchange gifts with friends and family for any occasion. Create a universal wishlist, add items from any site, and share your list. Friends can reserve and buy items without needing to sign up. GiftList also offers an AI gift ideas generator and a shop of curated and popular products. GiftList offers an iOS mobile app and Chrome extension to make it easy to add items from anywhere.
